author: Lech Deregowski
comment: But rather basic without any customization features.
title: Great proof of concept

author: Timothy D
comment: Doesn't show up in watch faces or moto connect
title: Doesn't show up

author: Enrique R Grullon
comment: great experiment!

author: Nicolas
comment: nice!
title: nice

author: Imre Vogelezang
comment: Awesome watchface; most interesting one I've come across yet. Also one of the most useful watchfaces in dimmed mode; very readable. I have two requests though: (1) optional 24h-format; I can't get used to 12h format. (2) Notifications in dimmed mode overlay the clock and become unreadable.   Other than that: perfect.

author: Troy Spicer
comment: Don't make us suffer for Motorola's bad decisions. Also really doesn't fit properly on the lg gwatch screen. Numbers go off the edge.  Neat effect otherwise.
title: Flat tire oppression

author: jeremy pougnet
comment: This is one of the best watchface out there. Unfortunately, it is not optimized for the LG G Watch R as it has a black bar at the bottom. Would be nice to see an updated version with a completely round design.
title: Amazing but not optimized for G Watch R

author: Elisha Lucero
comment: On the Urbane /G watch R there's a flat tire on the bottom and also an issue where number text overflows to the borders. Probably due to not accounting for multiple watch screen sizes. Can't wait to see this improve!
title: Nice design and idea but all round watches are formatted like Moto 360

author: Kyle Swinburne
comment: I love the idea, it is one of the best watchfaces. However with the face responding to motion all the time it drains the battery very quickly. Perhaps if another option that responds to the touches and swipes of the user was present this would be a perfect watchface.
title: Great design

author: Blake Bryant
comment: Unable to get watchface to display just shows a black screen.
title: Doesn't work on Sony smart watch 3

author: Ric Haines
comment: Just a black screen on this watch, I'm afraid
title: Sony Smart watch 3

author: Jonathan Stinebaugh
comment: Using a moto 360 and even though top right corner of the number is cut off the watch face is incredibly smooth and I don't experience any lag, hope to see more added to the watch face!
title: Very cool concept!

author: Hasan Barakat
comment: Cool concept, but it doesn't quite fit the Moto 360. Please optimize for circular watch faces. Additionally, please add the ability to adjust the colors.
title: Nice design with some functionality shortcomings.

author: all adam
comment: On my moto 360 I like how the numbers are not centered and hang off the screen. But...it eats battery: (
title: Love it...but

author: Steve Crockett
comment: Not sure what's up with the flat tire on the Watch Urbane (it doesn't appear in the preview).
title: Cool idea and look.

author: Mike Romeo
comment: Decent watchface, but it's ruined by the black bar at the bottom.  Makes it look off-center on my LG G Watch R.

author: Afonso Santos
comment: Fantastic but I fail to understand the roll of permissions required for a... ...watchface ... PS: it doesn't work on my Sony SW3

author: Peter Lundgren
comment: Good looking watch face, but it gives a flat tire on the LG G Watch R, please fix that :)
title: Flat tire on GWR?

author: Mauro Lavigna
comment: I love it on LG G watch. Single best face out there. Those talking smack should give it another shot.
title: Awesome

author: Samuel Davis
comment: It returned an error the first time, now is only black
title: Not working on Sony SW3

author: Steve Cusack
comment: Feels like it's missing some customisation options (color swatch, etc.) and it would also be nice to have the date (I.e. day of month) somewhere on the watch face.
title: Nice

author: Mario de la Torriente
comment: This watch face gives my LGWR watch the dreadful flat tire look of the Moto 320.

author: Ludvig Nilson
comment: It doesn't seem to be compatible with Sony Smartwatch 3. The watchface never loads.
title: Did not work.

author: Austen Clement
comment: This is my favorite watch face on my Moto360!! It would be really cool to be able to manually select a color scheme for the face but the way it changes throughout the day is really great too! Bravo!

author: Sushant Rawal
comment: I am not able to download it because I have a Xiaomi phone. This sucks cause I have a LG G watch and the app would not download just because of the phone that I am using.  Can you change this?

author: Mikhail Ivchenko
comment: ...but, as said before, it doesn't work well on LG G Watch R. Also, a possibility to change colors could be cool.
title: Nice watch face...

author: Grant Hutchison
comment: Doesn't work on Sony Smartwatch 3

author: untaken name
comment: As title which is a shame
title: Doesn't work on Sony SW3

author: Luuk Van Den Berg
comment: It is a very beautiful watch face, but could you add a 24 hour mode and make the card transparent? Than it's a perfect watch face!
title: Beautiful watch face

author: Jeroen Debois
comment: Great concept, but it doesn't work perfect (yet) on round watches. I love the idea though. Keep it going!
title: Great concept but...

author: Boyd Drew
comment: Single digit hours should be centered and of course the ever mentioned flat tire... Not sure what you're thinking there...
title: Could be cool

author: Jason Lassourreille
comment: Slightly off center (too far to the right) on my Moto 360. Otherwise smooth animations and nice look.
title: Moto360

author: David L
comment: Entertaining.  Nice idea, but not formatted for the Urbane.

author: Canad1an Bac0n
comment: doesn't work on Sony sw3

author: Sen ectus
comment: Nothing but a black screen on the Sony Smartwatch 3

author: Jeremy MacNicol
comment: This is one of the best watchfaces I've seen yet. Looks great on a Moto 360. Nice job!
title: Amazing!

author: Steven Augustine
comment: Blank screen on Sony SW3

author: Ben Cowcher
comment: Doesn't work on SW3

author: David Moodley
comment: My new favorite watch face! Please add ability to change colours
title: Incredible!
